As the bell rang, Sparky, the first robot student, rolled into the classroom. Kids gasped, their eyes wide with curiosity. Sparky's metallic body gleamed under the fluorescent lights, and its sensors whirred softly. The teacher, Ms. Jenkins, welcomed Sparky with a smile, explaining how everyone would help it learn. During recess, Sparky struggled with hopscotch, but its attempts made everyone laugh. Soon, the children gathered around, teaching Sparky to jump. By the end of the day, Sparky had made friends and learned the joy of teamwork. As the sun set, it returned home, eager to share tales of laughter and learning.
